perturbation.original_text:
2.Payment. The Affiliate Advertising Share, if any, shall be payable quarterly and shall be due no later than forty-five (45) days
following the end of each calendar quarter for which a payment is due. If this Agreement is terminated during a calendar quarter,
the amount payable shall be determined as of the termination date.
perturbation.changed_text:
2.Payment. The Affiliate Advertising Share, if any, shall be payable quarterly and shall be due no later than sixty (60) days
following the end of each calendar quarter for which a payment is due. If this Agreement is terminated during a calendar quarter,
the amount payable shall be determined as of the termination date.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by altering the payment deadline for the Affiliate Advertising Share from 45 days to 60 days following the end of each calendar quarter. This creates uncertainty regarding which deadline should be enforced, leading to potential disputes over late payment penalties.

perturbation.original_text:
2.Payment. The Affiliate Transactional Share, if any, shall be payable quarterly and shall be due no later than forty-five (45) days
following the end of each calendar quarter for which a payment is due. If this Agreement is terminated during a calendar quarter,
the amount payable shall be determined as of the termination date.
perturbation.changed_text:
2.Payment. The Affiliate Transactional Share, if any, shall be payable quarterly and shall be due no later than thirty (30) days
following the end of each calendar quarter for which a payment is due. If this Agreement is terminated during a calendar quarter,
the amount payable shall be determined as of the termination date.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by altering the payment deadline for the Affiliate Transactional Share from 45 days to 30 days following the end of each calendar quarter. This creates uncertainty regarding which deadline should be enforced, leading to potential disputes over late payment penalties.

perturbation.original_text:
Notwithstanding anything to the contary in this Section 10, any breach involving failure to pay any amount due hereunder
must be cured within ten (10) days after notice. A breach involving Network’s failure to pay an amount due to Affiliate pursuant to Section 6 above
or Exhibit D hereto shall be deemed a breach as to Affiliate rather than a particular Station or Stations.
perturbation.changed_text:
Notwithstanding anything to the contary in this Section 10, any breach involving failure to pay any amount due hereunder
must be cured within fifteen (15) days after notice. A breach involving Network’s failure to pay an amount due to Affiliate pursuant to Section 6 above
or Exhibit D hereto shall be deemed a breach as to Affiliate rather than a particular Station or Stations.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by altering the cure period for failure to pay any amount due from ten (10) days to fifteen (15) days after notice. This conflicts with Exhibit D which states the Affiliate Advertising and Transactional Shares should be paid out in 45-60 and 30 days respectively. The introduction of different resolutions makes it unclear when the late payment will be considered breach.
